books.author: by Harlan Coben
books.description: Kat Donovan, an N.Y.P.D. detective, searches for the ex-fiancé who left her years before; her father’s murderer; and the reason the users of an online dating site are disappearing.
books.name: MISSING YOU

books.author: by Laurelin Paige
books.description: Collects "Fixed on You," "Found in You" and "Forever With You," the story of Alayna Wither and Hudson Pierce.
books.name: THE FIXED TRILOGY

books.author: by Donna Tartt
books.description: A painting smuggled out of the Metropolitan Museum of Art after a bombing becomes a boy’s prize, guilt and burden.
books.name: THE GOLDFINCH

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: Sydney, a college student, is fascinated by her mysterious next-door neighbor, Ridge.
books.name: MAYBE SOMEDAY

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: A woman’s life is upended when she discovers a letter from her husband she was not meant to read.
books.name: THE HUSBAND'S SECRET

books.author: by Jess Walter
books.description: Ruins both emotional and architectural, in Italy, Hollywood and elsewhere, figure in this sweeping novel.
books.name: BEAUTIFUL RUINS

books.author: by Sue Monk Kidd
books.description: The relationship between a wealthy Charleston girl, Sarah Grimké, who will grow up to become a prominent abolitionist, and the slave she is given for her 11th birthday.
books.name: THE INVENTION OF WINGS

books.author: by Christina Baker Kline
books.description: A historical novel about orphans swept off the streets of New York and sent to the Midwest in the 1920s.
books.name: ORPHAN TRAIN

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: Two C.E.O.s — one a man, the other a woman — face very different challenges.
books.name: POWER PLAY

books.author: by Terry Pratchett
books.description: In this Discworld fantasy set in Ankh-Morpork, Moist van Lipwig is put in charge of a powerful new machine.
books.name: RAISING STEAM

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A sequel, about race and inheritance, to “A Time to Kill.”
books.name: SYCAMORE ROW

books.author: by Jeffrey Archer
books.description: The Clifton Chronicles reach the 1960s in the fourth volume of the series.
books.name: BE CAREFUL WHAT YOU WISH FOR

books.author: by Olen Steinhauer
books.description: The murder of an American diplomat in Hungary has repercussions for the intelligence community in Egypt.
books.name: THE CAIRO AFFAIR

books.author: by Jean Hanff Korelitz
books.description: A therapist who has written a book about how women fool themselves fails to heed her own advice.
books.name: YOU SHOULD HAVE KNOWN

books.author: by Brian McGilloway
books.description: A police officer in Northern Ireland, investigating the case of a missing teenager, discovers a little girl wandering in the woods, her hands covered in blood.
books.name: LITTLE GIRL LOST
